title: A thief in jail
description:
Hello your Highness,
This your captain guard speaking.
We have a thief in our jail for two weeks.
It would be great if you could state your judgment, should we hang him?
Oh, yes, I almost forgot.
He stole some food from a market stall
supposedly for his sick family.
Ah! He stole right in front of my guys! What an idiot!
Oh... well, my apologize for my vocabulary your Highness.
Well then, hang or not hang?

title: A thief no more in jail
description: Hello ‘highness, remember the thief from last week? Well, we have another kind of problem with him. He kind of flee. I immediately send five men after him, but maybe I shouldn’t have.
buttons: Send more men (5) to kill him
Send more men (5) to bring him back

title: Ball with Farstan son
description:
Hello your Highness.
Here is your humble servant Farstan, let me express you all my condolence for your father.
A ball will be hold next week between some of my friends.
Let me offer to you to go to this ball with my dear son, without any thoughts of course, just to allow you to forget your sorrow for a couple of hours

title: Hunt with Farstan
description:
Hello your Highness.
Here is your humble servant Farstan, let me express you all my condolence for your father.
Let me offer to you to go hunt with me, allowing you to forget your sorrow for a couple of hours

title: No harvest this month
description: Your Highness, my most sincere condolence for your father death. I hope you are doing well. I send you this letter for an urgent matter. Last month, the cold destroyed our harvest. Your father promised us he will pay as if our harvest were done without a problem to allow us to have money to buy food for our family despite this unfortunate event. I am sure you share his values and would agree to fulfill his promise.
buttons: Ignore and ask to give food this month as always

title: My own cooker steals from me!
description:
Hello your Highness.
I send you all my condolence for your lose.
And I send you this letter about a crime of the most abject nature.
No later than yesterday, I saw one of my cooker steals my wife necklace.
He stole it just in front of chamberlain eyes!
Of course, I execute him this morning.
But now his familly say it was a lie and claims compensation.
Would you please provide me some soldier to teach them how to respect the noblemen from your country?
buttons: Send men to submit the peasants (5)
Send men to investigate the case (5)

title: Mage Circle Wish
description: Hello, your Highness. I am the Mage Circle Representative. As you may know, we work for the crown to develop new magic systems to answer the crown and citizen needs. But recently, some member of the Mage Circle started to wish study our island, on more a scientifical aspect than creating new magical object. Of course, we cannot decide to stop our work on our own. So here I am to ask you if we can leave aside our usual work to focus ourselves on the study of the island.
buttons: Agree and give food every week (3)
Agree and give gold (5), food every week (2) and men (5)
Refuse and ask for new long distance communication device
Refuse and ask for better means of transport
Refuse and ask for more powerful weapons
Refuse and ask to develop new harvesting tools

title: Can't go to the mountain lake
description: Your Highness, I understand it is not really your problem, but it is a big one for me. See, each years I travel from east to west with my sheeps and I always stop by Trysam on the way. But this year, the Church men prevent me to approach the city. I don't understand, since when is it prohibited to go out there? Help me to access the city, the travel is too long otherwise.

title: More roads!
description: Hello. I know you are a kind sovereign, and you wish the best for your people and the development of Arim. With this idea in mind, allow me to express an idea: what about construction a road to the little village of Nasir? They are so isolated, I am sure a road will benefit to everyone, faster development for them, more client for me, some gold for you.

title: Strange bones in my field
description: Your Highness, I’ve found something strange in my field while working the land last week. I don’t know what it is, never something so big. Looks like a bone. Maybe some giant, but never knew there was some here before.  I don’t know what I should do about it, bones don’t burn well so I thought maybe you would be interested.
buttons: Keep the bone as decoration for the castle
Give the bones to the nobles
Give the bones to the merchant
Let him do as he want

title: Gift merchant
description: Hello Your Highness, I am a merchant from Nasir! Thank you for creating the road. I sell some goods from my village, would you like to buy some?

title: Expedition to the island
description: Your Highness, let me introduce myself. I am Sir Foliram from the merchant guild. I have recently set my eyes on the island on the North-east of our magnificent land. I am sure there is people living out there, and, for sure, potential client. I have sent some of my ship out there, but they only are fish boat, they cannot travel so long distance. I realized my mistake after they are departure from the port and are now lost to the sea. But I am sure than, with your assistance, we can set an expedition and contact the island inhabitant. Can I hope receive your help?
buttons: Agree and provide food for the travel (7)
Agree and give gold to build one boat (5)
Agree and give gold to build several boats (12)
Refuse but give gold for the lost boats (5)

title: Expedition to the island
description: Your Highness, let me introduce myself. I am Sir Foliram from the merchant guild. I have recently set my eyes on the island on the North-east of our magnificent land. I am sure there is people living out there, and, for sure, potential client. I have sent some of my ship out there, but they only are fish boat, they cannot travel so long distance. I realized my mistake after they are departure from the port and are now lost to the sea. But I am sure than, with your assistance, we can set an expedition and contact the island inhabitant. Can I hope receive your help?
buttons: Agree and provide food for the travel (7)
Agree and give gold to build one boat (1)
Agree and give gold to build several boats (5)
Refuse but give gold for the lost boats (1)

title: Protection for my daughter
description:
Hello Your Highness.
Here is your humble servant Farstan.
I know it must seems abrupt, but I need your assistance on a little thing.
My daughter must go to one of here friend feast next week.
Unfortunately, she has no one to accompany her and I fear something could happen to her on the way. Would I dare to ask you to provide some men to protect her?

title: Road to Trysam closed
description: Your Highness. One of my employee come back yesterday with a strange new : all the road to Trysam seems to be closed. It is quite an infortunate news as some of my most important clients live there. Would I dare to ask your assistance to reopen the way to Trysam?

title: Road to Trysam closed
description: Your Highness. One of my employee come back yesterday with a strange new : all the road to Trysam seems to be closed. It is quite an infortunate news as some of my most important clients live there. Would I dare to ask your assistance to reopen the way to Trysam?

title: My daughter mariage
description: Hello Your Highness. This weekend I celebrate my dear daughter mariage. I would like for you to come to celebrate with us. Will you make us the honor of your presence?

title: My daughter mariage
description: Hello Your Highness. This weekend I celebrate my dear daughter mariage. I would like for you to come to celebrate with us. Will you make us the honor of your presence?

title: My daughter mariage
description: Hello Your Highness. This weekend I celebrate my dear daughter mariage. I would like for you to come to celebrate with us. Will you make us the honor of your presence?

title: My daughter mariage
description: Hello Your Highness. This weekend I celebrate my dear daughter mariage. I would like for you to come to celebrate with us. Will you make us the honor of your presence?

title: Start War
description: As your command, we start to chartering the vessels to launch an attack on the island. Thanks to the

title: Hydra - Victory
description: We successfully killed the Hydra your Highness! Your people seem quite pleased by the new. How about hosting a feast to celebrate this victory? We could eat the hydra at the occasion.

title: Hydra - trophy
description: Your Highness, I heard you killed a Hydra recently. I would love to have it to expose it in my hall. Of course, I will give you some gold in exchange of such a lovely trophy. Best regard, Lord Loniriss

title: Hydra - to sell
description: My salutations your Highness, I hope this letter find you well. The word about you killing a hydra reach my ears. For a mutual profit, I offer to you to give me the body, I will sell it and, of course, we will share the money I could get from it.

title: The hydra eat everything!
description: Your Highness. I have a big problem. I tried to ask some soldiers to repeal a hydra, but I was told YOU decided to invite it to stay in our sea. Now it is eating all the fish around the eastern seaboard. Please, do something.
buttons: Send soldiers to ask the hydra to leave

title: Invitation to the Loniriss feast
description: Your Highness, it is my ulmost pleasure to invite you to my annual feast. As you know, all the noblemen of Arim will be there and we all sincerily hope for your presence.
buttons: Send gift and apologize for not being able to come
Send gold(7) and apologize for not being able to come

title: Invitation to the Loniriss feast
description: Your Highness, it is my ulmost pleasure to invite you to my annual feast. As you know, all the noblemen of Arim will be there and we all sincerily hope for your presence.
buttons: Send gold(7) and apologize for not being able to come

title: Invitation to the Loniriss feast
description: Your Highness, it is my ulmost pleasure to invite you to my annual feast. As you know, all the noblemen of Arim will be there and we all sincerily hope for your presence.
buttons: Send gift and apologize for not being able to come
Send gold(7) and apologize for not being able to come

title: Invitation to the Loniriss feast
description: Your Highness, it is my ulmost pleasure to invite you to my annual feast. As you know, all the noblemen of Arim will be there and we all sincerily hope for your presence.
buttons: Send gold(7) and apologize for not being able to come

title: Feast at the Loniriss manor
description: A feast is to be given in Trysam for the most famous noble family of the area, but the Church prevents any outside visitors, who even know what they may have done to our friends the Loniriss. Help us bring them back to reason! (And open the way for us for this celebration, it is an event that you should A-BSO-LU-TLY not miss)!

title: Your mariage
description:
Hello your Highness.
It may seems too soon for you, but I think the time as come for you to think about your mariage.
Some options offer to you. The most logical would be to marry a noble. But you can still marry a merchant child to bring gold to our kingdom. Of course, nothing prevent you from marrying a farmer or no one. Do not forget the island chief was interested by you, I am sure you can propose to him.

title: Your mariage
description:
Hello your Highness.
It may seems too soon for you, but I think the time as come for you to think about your mariage.
Some options offer to you. The most logical would be to marry a noble. But you can still marry a merchant child to bring gold to our kingdom and I think sir Farstan son was interrested by you. Of course, nothing prevent you from marrying a farmer or no one. Do not forget the island chief was interested by you, I am sure you can propose to him.

title: Your mariage
description:
Hello your Highness.
It may seems too soon for you, but I think the time as come for you to think about your mariage.
Some options offer to you. The most logical would be to marry a noble. But you can still marry a merchant child to bring gold to our kingdom and I think sir Farstan son was interrested by you. Of course, nothing prevent you from marrying a farmer or no one.

title: Your mariage
description:
Hello your Highness.
It may seems too soon for you, but I think the time as come for you to think about your mariage.
Some options offer to you. The most logical would be to marry a noble. But you can still marry a merchant child to bring gold to our kingdom and I think sir Farstan would be happy to propose to you his daugther. Of course, nothing prevent you from marrying a farmer or no one.

title: Your mariage
description:
Hello your Highness.
It may seems too soon for you, but I think the time as come for you to think about your mariage. Some options offer to you. The most logical would be to marry a noble. But you can still marry a merchant child to bring gold to our kingdom. Of course, nothing prevent you from marrying a farmer or no one.

title: Monster attack on the roads
description:
Hello Your Highness, I hope you are well.
I wrote to you regarding the last events.
With the agitation of the monsters, some are on the roads and attack the merchants. The latter now refuse to use the forest roads unless they have an escort, did you want to give them one?

title: It's outrageous!
description: Your Highness! I just saw something absolutely outrageous! I was walking down the street, looking at the goods sold by the merchant when I saw it. My brother ring, on the merchant stall! And he tries to sell it to me! My brother dies during the monster attack, this merchant must have thief it from my brother body, or from his house. I am sure all his abject merchandise are stolen objects from people dead or which flee their house. You surely not can let him be?
buttons: Send guard to arrest the merchant (5)
Send guard to confiscate the goods to give them back to the familly (2)

title: Blockade on the capital city!
description: Your Highness, it's an emergency! The merchant of the island made a blockade on our city. They prevent everyone to enter or leave. We didn't receive the food supply from the peasants this week and it looks like we won't get it this month. And we can't count on the gold too
buttons: Send men to stop the blockade (10)
Go talk to the merchant on person
